details.command: mpiexec R CMD BATCH --vanilla --quiet "--args use_MPI=TRUE n_workers=0 n_blocks=1 popSize=100 maxiter=100 run=10 stock_id=$PBS_ARRAY_INDEX n_iter=500 n_yrs=50 fhist='one-way' catch_rule='catch_rule' ga_search=TRUE lag_idx=FALSE range_idx_1=FALSE range_idx_2=FALSE range_catch=FALSE exp_r=FALSE exp_f=FALSE exp_b=FALSE  interval=FALSE multiplier=FALSE upper_constraint=TRUE lower_constraint=TRUE  obj_SSB=FALSE obj_F=FALSE obj_C=FALSE obj_risk=FALSE obj_ICV=FALSE obj_ICES_PA=FALSE obj_ICES_PA2=FALSE obj_ICES_MSYPA=TRUE collate=TRUE scenario='PA' stat_yrs='more' add_suggestions=TRUE" $HOME/git/wklife9_GA_tmp/run_ms.R $HOME/reports/$PBS_JOBID.$PBS_ARRAY_INDEX.Rout
